english.title: Ma32ol
text: You could move away ,so this is the end?
Your heart in a seconds sold our most beautiful love days
Is it irrational ,that theres people like that
Feelings ,honesty ,its such easy to leave it ,its irrational
I thought that you are mine ,I gave you all my life
I lived in illusions for years ,I regret for that
And I returned back alone ,again with my pain and tears .. is it reasonable !
Is it irrational ,that theres people like that
Feelings ,honesty ,its such easy to leave it ,its irrational
